item.title: (Almost) The first advertisement featuring a cricketer in India
item.description: From : Back page of ‘Bombay Pentangular’, S. K. Roy (1945) featuring C. K. Rayudu - India’s first great cricketer. Major C.K. Nayudu, once again, as on the first day of the match, was the idol of the huge crowd. Whether ‘C.K.’ played a ball, sent down a delivery or did some fielding, everything was cheered. Going out after tea on Sunday, he was literally mobbed by youthful admirers, each wanting to tap their hero on the back.
